channel.title: Flex + Sockets
channel.description:
I'm currently writing an app using Flash Builder and it's to communicate with a server hosted on the users computer. I can make the server connect if the app is running on the pc as an AIR app (?), but not when running on a phone. An IOError is thrown, but I have no idea whats wrong here. Has anyone worked with anything like this before?
What I mean: [youtube]http://youtu.be/TZHUbQC6ZxE[/youtube]
Thanks
